data.meta_description: Hackley Summer Programs drop-off and pick-up directions
data.text:
Drop off/Pick-up Instructions

There will be posted signs on campus directing all traffic to the Saperstein Arch check-in/out area. Parents, guardians, care-givers and other authorized adults need to check-in and check-out children each morning and afternoon. If your child(ren) will not be attending on certain days for whatever reason, please let the director (psawkins@hackleyschool.org) know via email at your earliest convenience.

Hackley does not offer transportation to or from the Summer Program.
